Articles.Content: I love rover wheels. But I HATE the fact that they have no sound. Driving becomes just dull without sounds. Please add some sounds in the near future
There's WheelSounds if you're not opposed to mods
That's a mod and mods need updating after updates and I have to download new versions and that is annoying because my internet is terrible on my computer.(I am writing this on an iPad)

That's a mod and mods need updating after updates and I have to download new versions and that is annoying because my internet is terrible on my computer.(I am writing this on an iPad)

It hasn't been updated since last year and still works and will continue to work between versions (albeit unity 5 will probably break it).
Since RCS now have sounds, what about giving rover wheels some love?
